function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Collaboration and project management tools for peer review and consultation"},{"name":"Use of uv-c disinfection technology for food preparation surfaces"},{"name":"Use of contactless payment systems to reduce physical interactions during transactions"},{"name":"Contactless service technology"},{"name":"Community health education programs"},{"name":"Contact-tracing technology"},{"name":"Customer feedback software"},{"name":"Environmental design software"},{"name":"Customer flow management systems"},{"name":"Health and safety training modules"},{"name":"Communication platforms for updates and website updates"},{"name":"Iot sensors for monitoring hygiene"},{"name":"Collaboration platforms for knowledge sharing and communication tools for industry stakeholders"},{"name":"Food safety management software"},{"name":"Iot sensors for temperature monitoring and mobile training apps"},{"name":"Online ordering and delivery platforms and reservation systems"},{"name":"Food truck management software, customer relationship management crm tools, hygiene management tools, sustainability certification platforms and eco-labels"},{"name":"Blockchain for supply chain transparency and ethical sourcing platforms"},{"name":"Remote sensing for environmental monitoring and nature conservation technologies"},{"name":"Use of advanced sanitation and sterilization equipment"},{"name":"Deployment of telemedicine services and development of mobile health clinics"},{"name":"Use of advanced diagnostic tools for disease detection"},{"name":"Development of biosecurity measures for animal enclosures and deployment of remote sensing technology for wildlife monitoring"},{"name":"Utilize eco-friendly wastewater treatment technologies, implement biogas production from organic waste and deploy sensor-based monitoring systems for water quality"},{"name":"Sustainable tourism planning tools, cultural preservation apps, and virtual reality tools for cultural education"},{"name":"Sanitation and waste management technologies"},{"name":"Community empowerment and education programs and hygiene management systems"},{"name":"Training and development programs, staff scheduling and management software, performance management tools"},{"name":"Telemedicine for remote health consultations"},{"name":"Educational materials on disease prevention, hygiene training materials"},{"name":"Remote work technology for reduced physical contact and remote healthcare support"}]}
